item.title: Test estimation
item.description: Links Software Test Estimation Techniques: Step By Step Guide Firstly summarise this article 1 2 3 4 5 6 * Resources: Resources are required to carry out any project tasks. They can be people, equipment, facilities, funding, or anything else capable of definition required for the completion of a project activity. * Times : Time is the most valuable resource in a project. Every project has a deadline to delivery.
